about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi! I'm the creator of this AI-powered murder mystery game.
about.p1b: I love combining storytelling, technology, and interactive experiences.
about.p1c: This project is a blend of my passion for games, AI, and creative problem-solving.
about.p2: If you enjoy the game or have feedback, feel free to reach out!

how.title: How It Works
how.subtitle: AI Murder Mystery is an interactive detective experience powered by advanced AI models. Each game session generates a brand new, unique murder case for you to solve by interrogating suspects, collecting clues, and making your final accusation.
how.aiBackendDesc: The AI backend powers all scenario generation, suspect dialogue, and clue extraction for your game session.

items.whatGame_a: This is an AI-powered murder mystery game. You play as a detective, questioning suspects and solving the case using clues and logic.
items.howPlay_a: Read the scenario, talk to suspects, gather clues, and try to deduce who the culprit is. Use the chat to ask questions and submit your accusation when you think you know who did it, and with what weapon. If you don't have the correct weapon, try investigating some more.
items.canLose_a: No. If you accuse the wrong suspect, the case remains unsolved, but you can just keep investigating or guessing. The Engine is entirely run by AI, so it will adapt to your actions, but it isn't perfect. If you encounter any troubles at all, try a new scenario.
items.sameStory_q: Is the story the same every time?
items.sameStory_a: No, each game generates a new scenario with different suspects, motives, and clues.
items.repeat_q: Then can I try the same scenario again? Or repeat a scenario? Or ask for a specific scenario?
items.glitch_q: The AI is misbehaving / glitchy / doesn't remember things / is wrong!
items.glitch_a: Yeah, it's just an AI after all. Try correcting it, pointing it in the right direction, and if all else fails, try refreshing the page or starting a new game.
items.whoMade_a: This game was created by Natty Zepko using React and AI technologies.
items.suggest_a: I am mostly done with the project, but I am open to feedback and suggestions for improvement. Contact me at natty.zepko@gmail.com

submit.title: Submit Conclusion
submit.noWeaponsRevealed: No weapons revealed by dialogue yet.
submit.notEnoughEvidence: You have not collected enough evidence yet. Mention some weapons in suspects' dialogue.
submit.pickWeapon: Pick a weapon from the revealed list.
submit.wrong: Not quite. Keep investigating and try again.

main.title: Murder Mystery
main.intro1: Generate a scenario and inspect suspects, relationships, and witnessed events. (It might take a minute)
main.intro2: Be warned! Refreshing, closing, or moving to another page will reset the entire game! (but you can move tabs within this site)
main.selectSuspectPrompt: Select a suspect to start a conversation.
